subject: College Athletics
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Damon Evans, who was arrested on a drunken-driving charge last week in Atlanta, apologized again on the day his resignation as Georgia’s athletic director was announced by the university’s president.
snippet: Damon Evans, who was arrested on a drunken-driving charge last week in Atlanta, apologized again on the day his resignation as Georgia’s athletic director was announced by the university’s president.
